entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 8:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
